item.title: Pointers vs References
item.description: Some languages including C, C++ support pointers. Other languages including C++, Java, Python, Ruby, Perl and PHP all support references. On the surface both references and pointers are very similar, both are used to have one variable provide access to another. With both providing a lot of the same capabilities, itâ€™s often unclear what is different between these different mechanisms. In this article I will illustrate the difference between pointers and references.
